queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}}.volumeMounts.name={{spool}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}}.volumeMounts.name={{cache}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}}.volumeMounts.name={{vmail}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}}.volumeMounts.name={{cache}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}}.volumeMounts.name={{spool}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}}.volumeMounts.name={{cache}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}}.volumeMounts.name={{spool}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.description: Service has an external load balancer, which may cause accessibility from other networks and the Internet

files.expected_value: 'metadata.annotations' should be set
'metadata.annotations' should be set

queries.description: A Service Account token is shared between workloads

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{fill-chroot}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{fill-chroot}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{postmap}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{postmap}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{dovecot}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{dovecot}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{postfix}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{postfix}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot-vmail}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot-vmail}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot-vmail}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot-vmail}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postfix}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{postmap}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-dovecot}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{dovecot}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{fill-chroot}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-mok-postfix}}.spec.volumeClaimTemplates.spec.resources.requests.storage should not be set
